thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Prudential Says Agreed To Sell Its Consumer Finance Business In Vietnam for $151 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Prudential Says Agreed To Sell Its Consumer Finance Business In Vietnam for $151 Mln
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Prudential Plc:
* PRUDENTIAL PLC - REACHED AGREEMENT TO SELL 100% OF ITS CONSUMER FINANCE BUSINESS IN VIETNAM, PRUDENTIAL VIETNAM FINANCE CO LTD, FOR $151 MILLION
* PRUDENTIAL PLC - AGREEMENT IS WITH SHINHAN CARD CO., LTD., A SUBSIDIARY OF THE SHINHAN FINANCIAL GROUP, A LEADING KOREAN FINANCIAL INSTITUTION‍​
* PRUDENTIAL PLC - PRUDENTIAL AND SHINHAN HAVE ALSO AGREED A NEW LONG-TERM BANCASSURANCE PARTNERSHIP IN VIETNAM AND INDONESIA Source text: bit.ly/2DxjIjh Further company coverage: ( Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com )
